ocean.question: I’m big and blue and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live here.

ocean.question: I have many arms, but I can't hug. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am a sea animal.
🎨 I can change color.
🧠 I am very smart.

ocean.question: I’m a home made of shell, but nobody lives inside. You can hear the ocean when you put me to your ear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I am found on the beach.
🌊 The ocean made me.
👂 Put me to your ear.

ocean.question: I have a big mouth and sharp teeth. I'm a fish but I’m known to bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am sometimes scary.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🚨 You should be careful swimming with me.

ocean.question: I'm a very large animal that swims in the ocean. I sing songs, but I'm not a popstar. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🌊 I need to come up to breathe.
🎶 My songs travel far.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish with an electric personality. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️I can shock you.
🌊 I live in rivers and oceans.
🐍 I look like a snake

ocean.question: I'm a tiny, colorful creature that lives in a reef. People love to watch me go in and out of my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in the coral.
🏠 I live in a sea anemone.
🤡 I am orange and white striped

ocean.question: I am a large sea creature with a hard shell and pincers. I walk sideways on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have claws.
🚶I walk in a funny way.
🥘 I am a type of seafood.

ocean.question: I am a very large iceberg, made of frozen fresh water. I float in the ocean but where do I start out?

hints.text: 🧊 I am formed in cold places.
🏔 I begin high up, in a mountainous region.
❄️ I start out as snow.

ocean.question: I am a huge, underwater mountain range that stretches across the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌋 I have volcanoes.
🌊 I'm the longest mountain range on Earth.
🗻 I'm mostly underwater.

food.question: I am yellow and long, monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I grow on trees in warm places.
💛 I am a popular fruit, often eaten as a snack.
🍌 My peel can be slippery.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I help build strong bones.
🥛 You can pour me on your cereal.
❄️ I am often cold.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
✨ I am good for your eyesight.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me!

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. Sometimes I am used to make juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An _____ a day keeps the doctor away.
🥧 I am a popular flavor for pies.
🧙 A fairy tale tells of a poisoned one.

food.question: I am long and green. I'm a popular topping on pizza and I am a vegetable. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often pickled.
🥒 I am cool and refreshing.
🥗 I am a common ingredient in salads.

food.question: I am made of flour, water and yeast and baked in the oven. I can be sliced and used for sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I come in many different shapes and sizes.
🥖 You can use me to make toast.
🥪 Peanut butter and jelly go well with me.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. I grow on vines. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am small and oval-shaped.
🥄 You can scoop out my flesh with a spoon.
🌱 I am named after a flightless bird.

food.question: I am a dish made of rice, vegetables, and often meat or seafood. You eat me with chopsticks. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am a staple food in many Asian countries.
🥢 You might order me at a Chinese restaurant.
🍳 Some versions are made with egg and soy sauce.

food.question: I am a frozen dessert made from milk, cream, sugar, and flavorings. I come in many different flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am often served in a cone or a cup.
🍨 I am a popular treat on a hot day.
🍫 I can be chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, or many other flavors.

food.question: I am a type of mushroom that grows underground near tree roots. Specially trained pigs or dogs are often used to find me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍄 I am very expensive and considered a delicacy.
🐕 I have a strong, earthy aroma.
🇫🇷 I am often shaved thinly over pasta or other dishes, originating from France.
